conjurer:Aqua.DESCRIPTION: [A-B] #yElement. Playing [A-R], [A-G], or [A-O] cards on targets with [conjurer:Aqua] triggers #yReactions.
conjurer:Aqua.NAME: Aqua

conjurer:Back Link.DESCRIPTION: Activates when a #ySummon behind this #ySummon that meets this condition's requirements is #yTriggered.
conjurer:Back Link.NAME: Back Link

conjurer:Blasted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of the player turn, then reduce stacks by #b{0}%.
conjurer:Blasted.NAME: Blasted

conjurer:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Apply the last #yElement you manually leveled up to an enemy. The first time each turn you level up an #yElement manually, gain #b1 #yCharge.
conjurer:Charge.NAME: Charge

conjurer:Cooled.DESCRIPTION: Every #b{0} stacks increase damage taken from #yAttacks and #yOrbs by #b1 and reduce damage dealt by #b1. Removed at round end.
conjurer:Cooled.NAME: Cooled

conjurer:Element.DESCRIPTION: [conjurer:Ignis], [conjurer:Aqua], [conjurer:Ventus], [conjurer:Petra]. Playing cards on targets with #yElements consumes those #yElements to trigger #yReactions.
conjurer:Element.NAME: Element

conjurer:Elemental Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply #yElements, increase their stacks.
conjurer:Elemental Mastery.NAME: Elemental Mastery

conjurer:Flow.DESCRIPTION: During your turn, spend #b{0} [conjurer:Flow] to fetch the top card of your draw pile.
conjurer:Flow.NAME: Flow

conjurer:Forging.DESCRIPTION: Right-click a card in hand to spend #b{0} [conjurer:Forging], upgrade it, and increase its damage and #yBlock by #b{1}.
conjurer:Forging.NAME: Forging

conjurer:Front Link.DESCRIPTION: Activates when a #ySummon in front of this #ySummon that meets this condition's requirements is #yTriggered.
conjurer:Front Link.NAME: Front Link

conjurer:Frozen.DESCRIPTION: Take #b+{0}% damage from [A-R] cards per stack. On the turn this is first applied, the target is #yStunned.
conjurer:Frozen.NAME: Frozen

conjurer:Ignis.DESCRIPTION: [A-R] #yElement. Playing [A-B], [A-G], or [A-O] cards on targets with [conjurer:Ignis] triggers #yReactions.
conjurer:Ignis.NAME: Ignis

conjurer:Impedance.DESCRIPTION: Reduces damage taken from cards with specific #yAffinities.
conjurer:Impedance.NAME: Impedance

conjurer:Link.DESCRIPTION: Activates when a #ySummon in front of or behind this #ySummon that meets this condition's requirements is #yTriggered.
conjurer:Link.NAME: Link

conjurer:Lux.DESCRIPTION: [A-Y] #yElement. Reactions on the target are multiplied.
conjurer:Lux.NAME: Lux

conjurer:Matter.DESCRIPTION: #yReactions grant #yMatter. Can be spent to level #yElements.
conjurer:Matter.NAME: Matter

conjurer:Petra.DESCRIPTION: [A-O] #yElement. Playing [A-R], [A-B], or [A-G] cards on targets with [conjurer:Petra] triggers #yReactions.
conjurer:Petra.NAME: Petra

conjurer:Petrified.DESCRIPTION: Receive and deal #b{0}% less damage. Reduced by #b1 each turn.
conjurer:Petrified.NAME: Petrified

conjurer:Reaction.DESCRIPTION: Playing cards on targets with #yElements triggers #yReactions, activating effects based on the cards' #yAffinities.
conjurer:Reaction.NAME: Reaction

conjurer:Umbra.DESCRIPTION: [A-P] #yElement. Reactions on a non-#ySummon, non-boss target have a chance to instantly kill it.
conjurer:Umbra.NAME: Umbra

conjurer:Ventus.DESCRIPTION: [A-G] #yElement. Playing [A-R], [A-B], or [A-O] cards on targets with [conjurer:Ventus] triggers #yReactions.
conjurer:Ventus.NAME: Ventus
